Jackery’s official Amazon storefront is undercutting the brand’s current direct Early Prime Day Sale pricing on its Explorer 1000 v2 Portable Power Station for $429 shipped, which is also eligible for a FREE 100W solar panel ($299 value), while the solo station sits $20 higher as part of the sale and the only solar bundle (200W) would run you $649 at the moment. During this period, the price is coming down from its usual $799 full rate, which only fell as low as $449 until July, when the 4-day Prime event gave us the first and only drop to its $399 low. This is the next-best price you can pick it up at, with $370 being cut from the tag, though, if you’re hoping to pick it up with bundled gear, it’s better to instead shop the Early Prime Day Sale here.

items.summary:
Ride1Up currently has an End of Summer Sale running and taking up to $600 off a selection of e-bikes, with increased savings on the Prodigy V2 Brose Mid-Drive 9-Speed e-bike for $1,895 shipped, while the Prodigy V2 belt-drive e-bike is back down at $2,595 shipped, as it’s been throughout most of the brand’s recent events. Normally, the chain-drive model goes for $2,495 in full, while the belt-drive counterpart sits higher at $2,795. We’ve seen discounts over 2025 take these rates as low as $1,995 and $2,595. While the belt-drive model is taking another lap around at the usual annual low, savings have increased on the chain-drive model to $600, landing it at the best price we have tracked all year. Head below for more on these models and the other e-bikes seeing discounts.

more…

items.title: Attach Smith & Wesson’s 1.75-inch Benji pocket knife to your keychain while it’s $12 (Reg. $18.50)
items.summary:
Smith & Wesson Benji Keychain Knife

Buy for $12 (Reg. $18.50)

What we love

While I like the idea of having a pocket knife on my person at all times, I despise carrying bulky things. That’s why something compact like this appeals more to me than more traditional solutions. When collapsed, it measures just 1.75 inches in length. This unit can easily be attached to a keychain so that whenever you have your keys, you’ll also have a pocket knife.

items.title: Jackery launches its new compact Explorer 240D 256Wh power station at Amazon with first savings from $139 (Reg. $209)
items.summary:
Running alongside its Early Prime Day Sale, Jackery has launched its newest backup power solution, and this one is not only coming in a more compact form factor to replace the discontinued Explorer 100 Plus, but its also seeing its first savings coming from Amazon. You can now pick up the Jackery Explorer 240D Portable Power Station at $139 shipped, which beats out the brand’s direct pricing (though it is stated on the landing page that it’s not yet available to buy), where it’s still sitting/starting at its full $209 rate. While this initial launch discount continues, you can be some of the first to score one for your on-the-go charging needs with a 33% markdown that cuts $70 off the going rate and sets the bar for future discounts. Head below for more on this and its bundle options.

more…

items.title: Place UGREEN’s metal MagSafe stand just about anywhere for a measly $10 (Save 29%)
items.summary:
UGREEN MagSafe Desk Stand

Buy for $10 (Reg. $14)

What we love

I know MagSafe is far from new, but to this day it remains one of my favorite iPhone features. I use it all the time and still find it incredibly satisfying to snap my iPhone onto a stand or mount and enjoy seeing it sleekly float there until I need to retrieve it. This metal stand affordably offers up yet another place for you to prop up your iPhone with an adjustable design that can extend and rotate 180 degrees.

We all have some outlets that could use some extra power outputs. This unit can affordably turn a single outlet into 9 power sources. I’ve personally been using one of Addtam’s outlet extenders in my office for well over a year now.

items.title: Baseus’ retractable 100W USB-C cable can charge two devices at once, grab it for $20.50 (Reg. $30)
items.summary:
Baseus Retractable 100W 2-in-1 USB-C Cable

Buy for $20.50 (Reg. $30)

What we love

If you’re anything like me, you gravitate towards retractable cables whenever possible. While you can tidy up cords with ties, cover, and the like, retractability is great when you have to use a cable here and there and don’t want your space to look messy. This one steps up what we’re used to seeing, turning a single USB-C cable into two with support for up to 100W of total output.

items.title: This 3-in-1 Qi2 charging station is also a lamp and it’s down to just $25 today (64% off)
items.summary:
Lamicall 3-in-1 Qi2 Charging Station with LED base

Buy for $25 (Reg. $70)

Enter promo code LSYQPW8A during checkout.

What we love

While the newer, more capable 25W Qi2.2 chargers are starting to show up, snagging a solid 3-in-1 15W Qi2 station like this for just $25 is tough to beat. You’re getting full 15W MagSafe charging for iPhone and other Qi2 compatible phones, a built-in Apple Watch puck, and a dedicated AirPods pad – all in one tidy setup. The highlight here is the LED base with five ambient color options, giving your desk or nightstand a clean, modern look while keeping everything powered.

items.title: Own your apps with Microsoft Office Pro for Windows at $50 (Reg. $240).
items.summary:
You can now grab Microsoft Office Pro 2021 for Windows for just $49.99 (Reg. $239.99). There are so many new tools for everything. Going to the app store now is like going to the grocery store, seeing thousands of brands selling the same thing. How many document apps do we need? Or project management apps and spreadsheets? Especially when so many of the new tools are filled with unnecessary features and back-end bugs. Why go through the trouble when the classic tools are still the most effective? That’s why Microsoft Office Pro 2021 for Windows is still one of the most popular business suites in the world.

more…
